message: This proposal divides the money equally, considering the decreasing value of money over time.
Take it or leave it, Alice!
I propose an equal division, taking into account the inflation rates and aiming for fairness.
You're getting low, Alice. Don't make me have to take it all!
I propose a division that slightly favors you, considering the decreasing value of money and my desire to reach an agreement.
You're running out of time, Alice. Don't make me have to take it all!
I propose a division that aims for a compromise, given the significant decrease in the value of money due to inflation.
